txt.en: Slop piles can be found scattered around Howlers' Notch.\n\nYou should burn any slop piles that you find.
Slop piles can be found scattered around Howlers' Notch.\n\nYou should burn any slop piles that you find.
Burned many slop piles at Howlers' Notch.

Howlers' Notch, once a Warg den, is now a place of terrible holding-pens for the captured Azhorns. Amongst the former warg dens, vile food lies scattered for the Azhorns. It is so foul that it is hard to discern what is food and what is not. Perhaps it would be best to burn it all in hopes of cutting off the camp supplies.
You have burned many slop piles at Howlers' Notch. Those in the war effort will be thankful for all that you have done here.
Howlers' Notch, once a Warg den, is now a place of terrible holding-pens for the captured Azhorns as they are trained for war.
